TopicTitle: 1.7...not getting ahead of me this time!

Articles.Content:
I have been using 1.4.3 since it came out. Every time my 12 or so mods get updated for a newer version, you guys come out with yet another one! Your killin' me, smalls!

Not this time, I'll be looking for 1.7 mods daily...you people aren't getting ahead of me again! LOL!

There's a pretty good chance that the mods that aren't updated will still work.

Offer null and void if the mod involved is Kopernicus.
Actually, Kopernicus has already been updated

You can be pretty lazy with the mods updating. Most of the time they work without any major bugs on several versions, and you need only update them for new features or big bugs. 

I generally just transfer the mods over, and wait till Kopernicus updates to start playing. 

tbf the Kopernicus update was really really fast this time goddamn
